name: ParserIT
description: Integration tests for the Parser class in the jsoup library.

test_cases.name: testIssue1251
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of a specific issue (Issue #1251) related to parsing large HTML strings with errors.

test_cases.name: handlesDeepStack
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of deep stack scenarios by parsing a very large HTML body fragment and verifying the resulting document structure.
